dct_title_s: Appletons' railway map of the United States and the Canadas : representing railways in actual operation, and those in course of construction, also map of the territories, showing the Pacific Railroad, gold regions, &c.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures.; Prime meridian: Washington, D.C.; Inset: [Western United States].; Advertisements and ancillary map: Map of Illinois Central Railway and connections, on verso.
